LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalDiedHater.stages.0.descr: Така бридка, надокучлива тварина. Я {0_gender ? радий: рада}, що її більше немає!

LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalBanishedHater.stages.0.d: My bonded animal was banished, finally.
LanguageData.VTE_NuzzledHater.stages.0.label: притулився
LanguageData.VTE_SoldMyBondedAnimalHater.stages.0.des: My nasty bonded animal was given away, about time!
LanguageData.VTE_SoldMyBondedAnimalMoodHater.stages.0: My nasty bonded animal was given away, about time!
LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalMasterHater.stages.0.des: Being around that nasty thing makes me hate life itself.
LanguageData.VTE_BondedAnimalMasterHater.stages.1.des: Being around that nasty thing makes me hate life itself.
That thing may like me, but I certainly don't like it back - I'm glad somebody else took it.
